title: Lucinda on the Roof: A Short Story
description: Johnny Barker was not expecting a package. But when a box arrives on his front steps, he finds himself saddled with a child too ugly to be human. As Johnny learns to cope with his new housemate, he discovers the events surrounding her actions bring more questions than answers. Why do the local store keepers refuse to stock their shelves? Why won't the other children acknowledge Lucinda's existence? And who is this mysterious "Father" of hers that he would send Johnny his child through the mail?A short story. (around 3000 words)
author: Blanche C. King
